name: Lovander

aura.name: heart_drain
aura.description: While fighting together, grants the player and Lovander the life steal effect which absorbs some of the received damage and restores HP.

description: Seeking a night of love, it is always chasing someone around. At first, it only showed interest in other Pals, but in recent years even humans have become the target of its debauchery.

skills.name: power_shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: poison_blast
skills.description: Hurls poison sludge at an enemy.

skills.name: shadow_burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: acid_rain
skills.description: Creates acidic clouds that pour down acid rain on enemies.

skills.name: power_bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: implode
skills.description: Risks its life to cause a violent explosion. Becomes incapacitated afterwards.

skills.name: pal_blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
